definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: A person, who is messianic in nature, can draw a great amount of light to them.
sentences.chinese: 一個人如果天生是彌賽亞，就能吸引大量的光。

sentences.english: Christians believe that Emanuel is the prophet Isaiah's prophecy of the Messiah.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒相信以馬內利就是先知以賽亞所預言的彌賽亞。

sentences.english: The office of priest -king was reserved by God for the Messiah, the Lord Jesus alone.
sentences.chinese: 祭司兼君王的位置，上帝唯獨保留給彌賽亞主耶穌。

sentences.english: The Old Testament is as explicit about the Trinity and the deity of the Messiah as is the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 舊約是關於三位一體和明確的彌賽亞神象新約。

sentences.english: He says that Jesus is the Messiah that the Old Testament long prophesied.
sentences.chinese: 他說耶穌就是舊約預言已久的彌賽亞。

sentences.english: It is not to the Samaritans that Messias shall come.
sentences.chinese: 彌賽亞是不會去撒瑪利亞的。

sentences.english: We need messiahs. The Second Comingevent is Messianic!
sentences.chinese: 耶穌再臨事件是彌賽亞的。

sentences.english: Even Jesus was reckonedan unlikely candidate for the Messiah.
sentences.chinese: 甚至耶穌都被看作不可能是彌賽亞。

sentences.english: Who says the Messiah is supposed to come from Galilee?
sentences.chinese: 彌賽亞豈是從加利利出來的嗎？

sentences.english: An unrighteous self-styled Messiah would soon have been exposed as a fraud.
sentences.chinese: 其他自稱是彌賽亞的人只能很快露出原形。

sentences.english: Lamb of God, the Messiah, Jesus, our Prince of Peace.
sentences.chinese: 神羔羊，禰是彌賽亞，耶穌和平之君。

sentences.english: Above all, the difference on the concept of Messiah is the biggest one.
sentences.chinese: 而彌賽亞思想是這兩大宗教的重要分歧之一。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
to pray on behalf of sb
